env.info: (hold 11) (plate 18) (at 0 8) (sort 1 human) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 desk) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 television) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 chair) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 bed) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (sort 6 refrigerator) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (type 6 container) (sort 7 closet) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (type 7 container) (closed 7) (sort 8 cupboard) (size 8 big) (at 8 8) (type 8 container) (opened 8) (sort 9 microwave) (size 9 big) (at 9 9) (type 9 container) (sort 10 book) (size 10 small) (color 10 yellow) (sort 11 book) (size 11 small) (color 11 green) (sort 12 book) (size 12 small) (color 12 white) (sort 13 bottle) (size 13 small) (color 13 green) (at 13 2) (sort 14 bottle) (size 14 small) (color 14 blue) (sort 15 cup) (size 15 small) (color 15 black) (sort 16 cup) (size 16 small) (color 16 white) (sort 17 remotecontrol) (size 17 small) (sort 18 can) (size 18 small)

test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:cons_not (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X human)))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y television))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y chair))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white) (sort Y closet))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X can))) )
test.nl: The door of refrigerator is closed. The door of microwave is opened. The door of the refrigerator must be closed. Do no go to the human. Put a cup on television. Put a bottle on cupboard. Put a book on the chair. Put the white book in the closet. Pick up the can.
